text: Franjo Mihalić (; March 9, 1920 – February 14, 2015) was a Croatian Yugoslav long-distance runner. He was best known for his 1958 win at the Boston Marathon and his marathon silver medal in the 1956 Summer Olympics. Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Yugoslavian athletes Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Long-distance runners
title: Franjo Mihalić
